name: Take (or?) care
description:
Take (or?) care is a game created for the extra credits game jam 6. It is a puzzle platformer where you take Care and can give it to "Sad Guys", but doing so may modify the world, there are different ways to play the 3 short levels in the game. Depending the how much care you give there are 5 different endings:

Greedy: take all the care and give none.

Caring: take and give all of the care.

Full: take  all of the care and give some.

Careless: take no care.

Misc ending: anything else

Note: there is a glitch where you get 2 care from one heart if this happens it might break the endings so just press r. (or  not)

This is my first game jam game constructive criticism is welcome.
